Page Title: GSMap ISRO Rain | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: GSMaP_MVK product, NOAA Climate Prediction Center (CPC) rainfall analysis, CPC Infrared brightness temperature, IMD gridded rain (0.25 degree), etc.

Page Title: GSMap ISRO Rain | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: -For gauge adjustment, the software used was JAXA MCD_V05.02, based upon Mega et al. (2019). -Merging NOAA CPC and Indian gauges was accomplished using Matlab software. -The algorithms pertaining to GSMaP_ISRO are provided in Kumar et al. (2022) in detail.

Page Title: GSMap ISRO Rain | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Kubota, T., Aonashi, K., Ushio, T., Shige, S., Takayabu, Y. N., Kachi, M., and Oki, R. (2020). Global Satellite Mapping of Precipitation (GSMaP) products in the GPM era. Satellite Precipitation Measurement: Volume 1, 355-373. Kumar, P., Gairola, R., Kubota, T., and Kishtawal, C. (2021). Hybrid assimilation of satellite rainfall product with high density gauge network to improve daily estimation: A case of Karnataka, India. Journal of the Meteorological Society of Japan. Ser. II, 99(3), 741-763. Kumar, P., Varma, A. K., Kubota, T., Yamaji, M., Tashima, T., Mega, T., and Ushio, T. (2022). Long-Term High-Resolution Gauge Adjusted Satellite Rainfall Product Over India. Earth and Space Science, 9(12), e2022EA002595. Mega, T., Ushio, T., Matsuda, T., Kubota, T., Kachi, M., and Oki, R. (2019) Gauge-Adjusted Global Satellite Mapping of Precipitation, IEEE Trans. Geosci. Remote Sens, 57, 4, 1928-1935.

Text Content: Kumar, P., Srivastava, S.S., Jivani, N., Varma, A.K., Yokoyama, C. & Kubota, T. Page Title: GSMap ISRO Rain | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: The number of gauge stations within a NOAA CPC pixel of 0.5 degree impacts the accuracy of the gauge-adjusted rainfall.
